about_the_game:
This bundle includes:

• 25 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 25 Rare Free XP boosters
• 25 Rare Crew XP boosters
• 25 Rare Gold boosters
• 25 Rare Credit boosters
• 25 Rare Cooldown boosters

Use this pack of boosters to speed up your upgrades on all fronts. Join the fight fully equipped and get the most out of every battle!

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
